sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>public</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.MyAssetEntitlements</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>true</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>MyAssetEntitlements</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var MyAssetEntitlements = (function() {
	var MyAssetEntitlement = {};
 	MyAssetEntitlement.assetEntitlements = function() {
		var entitlementArray = [];
		new GlideQuery('alm_entitlement')
			.where('assigned_to', gs.getUserID())
			.orWhere('allocated_to.assigned_to', gs.getUserID())
			.select('sys_id')
			.forEach(function(entitlement) {
				entitlementArray.push(entitlement.sys_id);
			});
		return entitlementArray;
	};
	return MyAssetEntitlement;
}());]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>vanisree.posanipalle@snc</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2021-09-28 06:02:58</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>96a680b61b7230104f07cb73604bcb5c</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>12</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>MyAssetEntitlements</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="My Assets" source="com.snc.asset_myassets">4208f4ec3cb1311068bcf327dfe37f66</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_96a680b61b7230104f07cb73604bcb5c</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2021-09-28 17:03:30</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
